title: Attempting to reconnect almost every game
body: i get this issue only with league for 20 seconds and the worst about it that its random it could disconnect me on the loading screen or at the middle of the game its been happening for 2 years now i have changed my router, reinstalled my computer, CHANGED my computer, changed the internet supplier and its still happening WHY. if anyone could help me i would be very happy

replies.body:
Even with all the things you've changed, it's very likely your network routing to the server is similar, regardless of your local ISP or network settings. Before we take a deep look into your routing, I need to ensure your local network settings are compatible with our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change at all.
i tried everything and its still happening and in the last two times i died because of this

Let's run a traceroute log so we can have a better understanding of how your connection gets to our servers. You can do this by grabbing a network app called [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/), plugging in **31.186.224.42** into the host field, then starting the trace. After it's run for about 5 minutes, export your results as text and paste them in a reply here.

Let me know if you run into any issues doing this.
sorry for not doing it sooner. so i went to the download link but it says that it does not support my windows (8.1) what should i do now
Can you ensure you've run all available Windows updates before trying to run the app? If you still see issues with installing it, [send me a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) of the error you get.

Based on this traceroute, it looks like your issue lies at the following Telia Node:
> **internap-ic-305857-ffm-b11.c.telia.net**

At this node, 99% of your packets (data) drops off and doesn't end up reaching our server properly. This is a big problem, as that data is crucial to ensuring a smooth experience in-game. I'd strongly recommend reaching out to a tier 2 agent or supervisor at your ISP and provide them this traceroute so they will have full context on the issue. Let them know what's going on in-game and that this traceroute was a test to our servers to show the routing issues.

Let me know if you have any questions.
